name: Vila
movement: walks at 30 feet, traverses difficult terrain easily
description: The Vila is an elegant creature with an exceptional dexterous build, standing as a protector of the forest with a refined presence enhanced by its fey nature. It possesses both a shortsword and a shortbow, each capable of inflicting piercing and poison damage.
memorable: The Vila's ability to manipulate the environment and summon beasts makes it a formidable foe in combat.
goals: To protect the forest and manage wildlife interactions while being a tough combatant.
relations: Often found in company with woodland creatures, it may summon wolves or wampus cats to assist in battle.
environment: Primarily found in forested areas, thriving in natural environments.
strengths: Superior agility and combat effectiveness due to poisoned weapons and battlefield control abilities.
attacks: Employs its Multiattack to use the Song of the Forest and then strikes with a shortsword or shortbow, dealing additional poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Song of the Forest can debilitate foes depending on their Wisdom saving throw, allowing the Vila to control the battlefield.
equipment: Wields a shortsword and a shortbow, each enhanced with magical poison.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and has a high passive Perception score of 18, making it very aware of its surroundings.
skills: Excels in Animal Handling, Perception, and Stealth, making it an adept creature in nature and combat.
additional_information: Can traverse nonmagical plants without restriction.
Has advantage on initiative rolls in forest terrain.
Has damage resistances to nonmagical attacks.
Ability to summon allies once per day.
test_queries: elegant forest guardian with poison attacks
agile fey creature skilled in stealth
vila can summon wolves to fight
creature that controls nature and wildlife
